episodes.title: Brixton Maoist cult: daughter speaks out
episodes.description:
Maoist cult leader Aravindan Balakrishnan is jailed for 23 years on charges of rape, sexually assaulting two women and imprisoning his own daughter. She waives her anonymity to speak out about the years of bullying she endured.

episodes.title: Maoist cult trial: main suspect found guilty
episodes.description:
The court decided he sexually assaulted two women and held his own daughter prisoner for 30 years. The south London Maoist collective leader Aravindan Balakrishnan could spend the rest of his life in jail after he was found guilty of a string of offences. Today his daughter welcomed the verdict - saying she was "overwhelmed with relief".
